title: Gervais Merchant Pilkington Davis Earl Extras Starbug81
description:
VOLUME ONE

THE TITLE SAYS IT ALL! This is a carefully compiled collection of Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant, Karl Pilkington, Warwick Davis & David Earl's BONUS EXTRAS :p
Every self-respecting AND self-loathing fan of the 5 aforementioned entertainers simply MUST experience each and every clip in my compilation. All of the clips are mp4's, half of which have appeared legitimately as extra special bonus features on various DVD's whilst the other half have been nabbed illegitimately from Youtube.

MY FAVOURITES INCLUDE;
Derek - The Making Of
Extras - Finding Leo With Gervais & Merchant
Extras - Taping Nigel
Gittins with David Earl as Brian Gittins
Graham Norton Show - Johnny Depp & Ricky Gervais
Jonathan Ross Gives Ricky Gervais A Kitten Called Ollie
Karl Pilkington - Satisfied Fool
Karl Pilkington Meets Michael Palin
Learn English With Ricky Gervais & Karl Pilkington
Life's Too Short - Liam Neeson Improv Bloopers
Meet Karl Pilkington (All 3 Parts)
Mr & Mrs - How Well Does Ricky Gervais Know Karl Pilkington
Robin Ince - Living With Ricky Gervais

You MIGHT also LIKE the Facebook page I created for "Brian Gittins";
David Earl aka "Kev from Ricky Gervais' Derek"

Please probe my increasingly popular IMDb list:
BEST BRITISH COMEDY SERIES': My Top 100 Pom-Coms      <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/list/tk9Ev4e6mBY/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/list/tk9Ev4e6mBY/</a>
*I'm very proud of it because it's received over 100,000 views. If you know of any other user-compiled IMDb lists that are less than 18 months old and have over 100,000 views, let me know... because I'm under the impression that I've achieved something :D
